data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nakayama, Ryo, Sasaki, Takenori, Nakano, Tomoyuki (2017): Molecular analysis reveals a new cryptic species in a limpet Lottia kogamogai (Patellogastropoda: Lottiidae) from Japan. Zootaxa 4277 (2): 237-251, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4277.2.4|9 occurrences
